data.title: A House Is Not A Homepage
data.text:
BURT BACHARACH: A SELECTED DISCOGRAPHY

Davide Bonori, February 3, 2024

Davide Bonori compiled the following chronological selected discography of Bacharach recordings. Davide has also compiled a categorical and alphabetical by artist discography.

Alec Cumming and Patrick Milligan’s original chronological discography, which includes additional information, is also still available. Alec and Patrick co-produced The Look of Love: The Burt Bacharach Collection for Rhino Records.
